## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass">Pass</a> for writing a module of IR out to a bitcode file.

Note that this is intended for use with the new pass manager. To construct a pass for the legacy pass manager, use the function above.

Definition at line 41 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/bitcode/bitcodewriterpass-h">BitcodeWriterPass.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Constructors

### BitcodeWriterPass() {#a2ddaa141d41200f9ba2c4fc20fb9dc74}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::BitcodeWriterPass::BitcodeWriterPass (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; OS, bool ShouldPreserveUseListOrder=false, bool EmitSummaryIndex=false, bool EmitModuleHash=false)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "explicit"]}>
Construct a bitcode writer pass around a particular output stream.

If <code>ShouldPreserveUseListOrder</code>, encode use-list order so it can be reproduced when deserialized.

If <code>EmitSummaryIndex</code>, emit the summary index (currently for use in ThinLTO optimization).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/bitcode/bitcodewriterpass-h/#l00055">55</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/bitcode/bitcodewriterpass-h">BitcodeWriterPass.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
